transArray.content: The hotel is very clean and the service is very good. It gives people a very friendly feeling. The breakfast is also very rich. The hotel is very convenient and there are ample parking spaces.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the hotel's environment and services. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road. It shares parking spaces with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces and is close to You can park for free by simply picking up an electronic parking coupon at the front desk when you are in the store. Public transportation is easily accessible around the hotel, making it your best choice for business trips and accommodation. The hotel strictly abides by Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures, and linens are changed and disinfected after each guest. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay environment. All hotel staff look forward to your every visit, and wish you the best Good work! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
